description: Heart of Midlothian sign midfielder Alex Lowry on loan from Rangers, with sporting director Joe Savage saying it "was too good an opportunity to pass up".
title: Alex Lowry: Hearts sign 'highly regarded' Rangers midfielder on loan
title_page: Alex Lowry: Hearts sign 'highly regarded' Rangers midfielder on loan - BBC Sport
maintext: Our coverage of Hearts is bigger and better than ever before - here's everything you need to know to make sure you never miss a moment
